data.lyric:
[ti:Money In The Grave (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Rick Ross]
[al:The Best In The World Pack]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Money In The Grave (Explicit) - Drake/Rick Ross
[00:00.56]Lyrics  by：Aubrey  Graham/W.  Roberts/L.  Currie/C.  Dade/A.  Joergensen
[00:01.12]Composed  by：Aubrey  Graham/W.  Roberts/L.  Currie/C.  Dade/A.  Joergensen
[00:01.68]Yeah okay
[00:09.09]'Lil CC on the beat hm
[00:13.58]Yeah yeah
[00:16.54]I mean where the f**k should I really even start
[00:19.96]I got hoes that I'm keeping in the dark
[00:22.29]I got my niggas 'cross the street living large
[00:24.74]Thinking back to the fact that they dead
[00:26.79]Thought my raps wasn't facts 'til they sat with the bars
[00:29.27]I got two phones one need a charge
[00:31.90]Yeah they twins I could tell they ass apart
[00:34.35]I got big packs coming on the way
[00:36.71]I got big stacks coming out the safe
[00:39.07]I got Lil Max with me he the wave
[00:41.61]It's a big gap between us in the game
[00:44.01]In the next life I'm tryna stay paid
[00:46.49]When I die put my money in the grave
[00:48.70]When I die put my money in the grave
[00:51.01]I really gotta put a couple niggas in they place
[00:53.07]Really just lapped every n***a in the race
[00:55.49]I really might tat "Realest Nigga" on my face
[00:57.89]Lil CC let it slap with the bass
[01:00.61]I used to save hoes with a mask and a cape
[01:02.81]Now I'm like "Nah love I'm good go away"
[01:05.17]Ain't about to die with no money I done gave it
[01:07.45]I was on top when that s**t meant a lot
[01:09.77]Still on top like I'm scared of the drop
[01:12.25]Still on top and these niggas wanna swap
[01:14.53]Niggas wanna swap like it's Slauson or Watts
[01:17.09]I don't wanna change 'cause I'm good where I'm at
[01:19.44]Mob Ties on 'em always good where I'm at
[01:21.79]Word to Junior Jazzy Baby J
[01:24.22]Tell 'em when I die put my money in the grave
[01:26.62]Couple figures killers call and collect Collect
[01:28.75]She f**k a n***a then she on to the next Next
[01:31.11]Really living large she in awe with a mack
[01:32.90]When you niggas thinking small in the mall with a rat Rat
[01:35.73]Roll with us if you really wanna get it Get it
[01:38.23]Go get a half a million in the Sprinter Sprinter
[01:40.83]Phone ringing B*****s know a big tipper Tipper
[01:42.91]I got the hookup and there's really no limit Limit
[01:45.27]Dead broke is in you niggas' DNA DNA
[01:47.66]Rickey Smiley's in Decatur with the 'ye
[01:50.19]Lil' n***a just another state case
[01:52.59]Bury my motherf**king Chase Bank time to bounce Bounce
[01:55.82]Gotta count on my allowance Gotta count on my allowance
[01:57.93]You niggas snitches so I gotta reroute it So I gotta reroute it
[01:59.94]A n***a dripping like I got a zillion dollars
[02:01.53]Got the trap jumping like Zion when I rebound then I'm out Then I'm out
[02:05.13]And I'll never talk about it About it
[02:06.92]The homies quiet but we all smoke the loudest Loudest
[02:09.28]Rich niggas and I'm really being modest
[02:11.21]'Cause the way I do my deals never treated like a artist want house House
[02:14.77]You could DM my accountant
[02:16.48]My per diem six figures and I'm counting
[02:18.81]Nine figures was the goal till I hit it
[02:21.17]These niggas ain't living so bury mine with me
[02:23.01]Ross got it! Maybach Music
[02:23.99]When I die put my money in the grave
[02:26.29]I really gotta put a couple niggas in they place
[02:28.53]Really just lapped every n***a in the race
[02:30.88]I really might tat "Realest Nigga" on my face
[02:33.33]Lil CC let it slap with the bass
[02:35.74]I used to save hoes with a mask and a cape
[02:38.31]Now I'm like "Nah love I'm good go away"
[02:40.50]Ain't about to die with no money I done gave it
data.trans:
[ti:Money In The Grave (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Rick Ross]
[al:The Best In The World Pack]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.56]//
[00:01.12]//
[00:01.68]好的
[00:09.09]Cydney Christine制作
[00:13.58]//
[00:16.54]怎么说 我究竟该从何说起
[00:19.96]我背地里藏了妹子
[00:22.29]我兄弟住在街对面 活得逍遥自在
[00:24.74]回想过去 Anthony Soares已经过世
[00:26.79]觉得我的说唱不够好 直到他们在监狱里听到我的歌
[00:29.27]我随身携带两部手机 一台需要充电了
[00:31.90]他们是双胞胎 我可以从他们的臀部分辨出来
[00:34.35]我赚大钱的机会就要到了
[00:36.71]我要从保险柜里掏出大钞票
[00:39.07]我身边站着Lil Max 他超厉害
[00:41.61]在说唱圈子里 我们之间有不可逾越的鸿沟
[00:44.01]下辈子 我还是要努力赚钱
[00:46.49]在我死后 把我的钱和我一同下葬
[00:48.70]在我死后 把我的钱和我一同下葬
[00:51.01]我真想拉几个人做我的垫背
[00:53.07]在比赛中打败所有人
[00:55.49]我想在脸上贴上最真实的人几个大字
[00:57.89]Cydney Christine 给我来点重低音
[01:00.61]以前 我带着面具 穿上斗篷 英勇地拯救妹子
[01:02.81]现在 我会说 亲爱的 我很好 闪远点
[01:05.17]不会死的时候没有钱吧 我已倾尽所有
[01:07.45]当这个圈子开始引人瞩目的时候 我已站上巅峰
[01:09.77]我依然站在巅峰 似乎我害怕从云端跌落
[01:12.25]我依然站在巅峰 有些人想抢夺我的位置
[01:14.53]有些人想抢夺我的位置 就像在Slauson Swap Meet一样
[01:17.09]我不想交换 我在这里挺好的
[01:19.44]切断所有联系 我过得挺好的
[01:21.79]就像我跟Junior Jazzy Baby J说的那样
[01:24.22]告诉他们 在我死后 把我的钱和我一同下葬
[01:26.62]几个数字 杀手们打来电话 要收账了
[01:28.75]刚和别人缠绵完 她就迫不及待地找下一个
[01:31.11]活得逍遥自在 她让人瞠目结舌
[01:32.90]当你目光短浅 和告密者在大庭广众之下密谋的时候
[01:35.73]如果你真的想要成功 就和我一起混
[01:38.23]去Sprinter赚个五十万
[01:40.83]电话响个不停 大家都知道我出手阔绰
[01:42.91]我接起电话 我前途无量
[01:45.27]你命中注定要当个穷鬼
[01:47.66]不会像Decatur的Rickey Smiley大受欢迎
[01:50.19]小弟弟 只是一次案件陈情
[01:52.59]等我死后 把我的大通银行的账户一同埋葬
[01:55.82]我得指望零用钱了
[01:57.93]你们这帮告密的人 我才不要和你们同流合污
[01:59.94]我的钱多到数不清楚 心满意足
[02:01.53]我抢到篮板的时候 就像Zion Williamson一样厉害
[02:05.13]可我绝口不提
[02:06.92]我兄弟话很少 可我们搞的都是劲最大的货
[02:09.28]我腰缠万贯 可我还是很谦虚
[02:11.21]我做事的方式 从来没人把我当做艺术家
[02:14.77]你可以给我发私信
[02:16.48]我的日常开销是六位数 我还在数
[02:18.81]九位数是我的目标 我再接再厉
[02:21.17]这些人毫无生气 把我的钱和我一同下葬
[02:23.01]Rick Ross真有钱
[02:23.99]在我死后 把我的钱和我一同下葬
[02:26.29]我真想拉几个人做我的垫背
[02:28.53]在比赛中打败所有人
[02:30.88]我想在脸上贴上最真实的人几个大字
[02:33.33]Cydney Christine 给我来点重低音
[02:35.74]以前 我带着面具 穿上斗篷 英勇地拯救妹子
[02:38.31]现在 我会说 亲爱的 我很好 闪远点
[02:40.50]不会死的时候没有钱吧 我已倾尽所有
